question: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا
answer: And We gave both of them

question: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ
answer: So We gave him the glad tidings

question: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ
answer: And We gave him glad tidings

question: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا
answer: And We saved both of them

question: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ
answer: And We called out to him

question: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا
answer: And We guided both of them
